atelier.title: My workshop
atelier.description:
Are you looking for a part, a watch, or something else related to antiques? Or is your watch not working anymore? Come visit the workshop!
My workshop is open from Monday to Thursday between 2:30 pm and 5:00 pm.
I am located in Geneva, at Rue des Corps-Saints 10, 1201 Geneva.

exposition.title: Exhibition
exposition.description:
In 2018, I founded a small permanent exhibition called Les curiosités horlogères. I invite you to discover my world and share my passion for watchmaking.
The exhibition is located in a small village, in the canton of Geneva. It is open to the public and you can visit by appointment. Maximum 5 people per visit.

cabinotiers.title: What is a cabinotier?
cabinotiers.description: The word 'cabinotier' is of Genevan origin. By combining technical precision and innovation, the art of the cabinotiers of Saint-Gervais contributed to Geneva's distinction. Since the 18th century, the word 'cabinotier' has encompassed trades related to watchmaking, such as case assemblers, guillocheurs, engravers, casemakers, gilders, and enamellers. They worked at home or in tiny 'cabins' under the roofs of houses.

confidentiality.title: Privacy Policy
confidentiality.intro: We attach great importance to the protection of your personal data. This privacy policy explains what information is collected when you use our site, how it is used and protected.
confidentiality.responsible: The data controller is Bruno Pesenti and his team.
confidentiality.data_collected: When you use the contact form or subscribe to the newsletter, we collect: name, email address, account creation date, and whether the account has been verified.
confidentiality.storage: Data is stored in a secure database.
confidentiality.newsletter_verification: If the account has not been verified, it is deleted the day after the newsletter subscription request.
confidentiality.retention: Your data is kept only as long as necessary to process your request. It is neither sold nor transmitted to third parties for commercial purposes.
confidentiality.security: We implement appropriate measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or disclosure.
confidentiality.rights: You have the rights of access, rectification, erasure, objection, and restriction of processing. To exercise these rights, contact us via the contact form available on the contact page.

concours.title: Contest Participation Policy
concours.description: This policy describes the rules and conditions for participating in the contest.
concours.rules: To participate in the contest, you must fill out the participation form, accept this policy, and subscribe to the newsletter. Participation is open to everyone. Only one entry per person is allowed. The winner will be drawn among the correct answers. If there is no correct answer, the person closest will be the winner.
concours.contact: The winner will be contacted by email if they responded via the online form and by phone if they responded via paper. Data collected for the contest will only be used for contest management and will not be shared with third parties. Participation implies acceptance of these rules.
concours.author: Bruno Pesenti, 28.08.2025
